string.value: If I go see #b#p9000021##k, I can receive a candle? A special MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary event...? Sounds interesting~

#b#p9000021##k told me if I safely guard the candles for 30 minutes, I will receive a #b#t04001167##k. Since I have to maintain connection in order to protect the candles, might as well have fun and play all day today.

I received a #b#t04001167##k!\nAfter safely keeping the candles, I received a #t04001167#. I should store away the #b#t04220045##k that I received from #p9000021#.\n#p9000021# said if I collect 5 cake pieces and complete the birthday cake, I will get a large gift.
